assassin.supernatural dodge: When an enemy you can see hits you with an attack, you can use your reaction to halve the damage taken.
assassin.luckt strike: If one of your attacks fails, you can turn that failure into a hit, and get a second chance. (critical damage)

duelist.duelism: When you wield a melee weapon in one hand,and no other weapons,you gain 25% bonus damage with that weapon.
duelist.combat with two weapons: When you are engaged in a two-weapon fight,you may occasionally land a second blow.

mage.conjuration: As a student of arcane magic, you possess a spellbook (or grimoire), that reveals the first glimpses of your true power.(receives a fixed element)
mage.arcana recovery: You learned how to recover some of your magical energy by studying your spellbook.(mana regeneration)

mage.circle spells: Your mystical connection to the land infuses you with the ability to cast certain spells. random bonus depending on the terrain.
mage.natural recovery: You can recover some of your magical energy by stopping to meditate and commune with nature.(hp and mp regeneration)

warrior.wild combat form: You assume a savage form adding a 3% damage bonus for each free gear slot.
warrior.wild form of elemental: Occasionally you summon an elemental form of pure essence to aid in the attack. The elemental's strength varies according to its level.

warden.dodge fortification: Warden are experts in defense, and know how to maximize the potential of their armor, you receive a 5% bonus for each medium armor piece of equipment.
warden.hybrid defense: When using two weapons or two-handed weapons you add a 15% bonus to your total dodge attack.

mage.overload: You can increase the power of your simpler spells. Occasionally your magic negates the opponent's defense.
mage.arcana recovery: You learned how to recover some of your magical energy by studying your spellbook.(mana regeneration)

warrior.get your breath back: You have a pool of stamina and can use it to protect yourself from harm.
warrior.combat with big weapons: When you are equipped with a two-handed weapon, you can occasionally use your vitality to increase % damage.

warden.fortification: Warden are experts in defense, and know how to maximize the potential of their armor, you receive a 5% bonus for each piece of heavy armor equipment.
warden.defense specialist: Your accumulated fortification, every 5 hits received, regenerates 8% of your health.
